publications.title: Video Transcript Extraction and Summarization using Transfer Learning
publications.overview: This paper presents a novel approach to generating concise summaries from video transcripts using Transfer Learning techniques. The model was trained on a diverse dataset and is particularly effective for content summarization.

publications.title: Intelligent Application of Voice Recognition and Personal Secretariat for Business Management
publications.overview: This paper discusses the development of a voice recognition personal assistant for local businesses to improve operational efficiency and customer service.

publications.title: Enhanced RSA Cryptosystem: A Secure and Nimble Approach
publications.overview: This paper presents a novel enhancement to the RSA cryptosystem, improving both security and efficiency in cryptographic applications.

publications.title: Information Extraction and Summarization of Medical Reports using Textract and GPT-2
publications.overview: Devised an OCR-based pipeline leveraging AWS Textract to extract textual data from medical reports and fine-tuned GPT-2 to generate concise summaries. This approach significantly improved retrieval efficiency and supports accurate disease prediction. (RAIC 2024)
